com.ibm.webest.processing.administration
Interface EstimationManagerServiceRemote

All Known Subinterfaces:
EstimationManagerServiceLocal
All Known Implementing Classes:
EstimationManagerService
public interface EstimationManagerServiceRemote

Service for tasks related to the estimates and the calculation process.

Author:
Andre Munzinger, Gregor Schumm, Wail Shakir
